title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 3 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 3 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
description:
C & R discuss the MLB labor drama and Max Scherzer ridiculously receiving criticism for showing up in a Porche. The fellas have fun explaining Covino's car situation, a great Reggie Jackson story and there are "appearances" by both Mike Tyson and Patrick Mahomes. Did Kyrie Irving win the game of 'Covid chicken' and is Zion tanking his own NBA value? The fellas talk FIGHTS and give love to Yankees -under-the-radar warrior, Paul O'Neill!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
